name: Suggestmeamovie
0:
”Alexa, suggest me a movie”
”suggest me a cool movie”
”something else”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: suggest me a movie
des:
[Update] Better, now you can specify a genre in the conversation-
"a good comedy movie" or "suggest me a cool action film"

The skill is to get a quick movie suggestion. If you don't like the suggestion, just let Alexa know, I'm sure she'll try better the next time.
To invoke, just say- 
"Alexa, suggest me a movie."
If you don't like the one, just respond with- 
"Nah" or "something else"
In case you got the one, acknowledge with-
"great" or "yes"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
